text: @PressSec @realDonaldTrump You know the majority of them ONLY test for the common cold & NOT Covid19. They're flawed. He should never have dropped the standards &allowed tests being sold with no proof they even work. Now get to work getting an accurate,quick test to market on a large scale then back 2 work
